```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(modelr)
library(pscl)
theme_set(theme_bw())

dates <- read_csv("speed-dating2.csv")
dates <- dates %>% 
  na.omit() %>%
  mutate(dec = case_when(.$dec == "no" ~ 0, 
                         .$dec == "yes" ~ 1))
```

## 1. Quais fatores têm efeito significativo na chance de p1 decidir se encontrar novamente com p2? 

```{r}
bm <- glm(dec ~ shar + attr + fun + intel + sinc + amb, 
          data = dates, 
          family = "binomial")
tidy(bm, conf.int = TRUE, exponentiate = TRUE)
```

```{r}
tidy(bm, conf.int = TRUE, exponentiate = FALSE)
```

```{r}
pR2(bm)
```
